text: Ate jinham lokam nu asi' kitaba diti si uha usa ciza tom' khusa hana jo tuhade upara utari ga'i hai ate unham saparadavam vica ajihe vi loka hana jihare isa de kujha hise tom inakari hana. Akho, ki mainu hukama dita gi'a hai ki maim alaha di badagi karam ate kise nu usa da sarika na mana. Maim use vala bula'unda ham ate use vala maim vapisa jana hai
